mapper.select: select tf.fair_no , tf.fair_title , tf.fair_address1 , tf.fair_address2 , tf.fair_startdate , tf.fair_enddate , tf.fair_name , tf.fair_userNum , ui.user_phone , ui.user_email , tf.is_delete , exists(select 1 from tb_fair_join where fair_no = tf.fair_no and loginID = #{loginId}) as exist_yn , fe.file_name , fe.file_size , fe.file_nadd , fe.file_madd from tb_fair tf join tb_userinfo ui on tf.loginID = ui.loginID left join tb_file fe on tf.file_cd = fe.file_cd where tf.fair_no = #{fair_no}
mapper.insert:
select ifnull(max(join_id), 0) + 1 from tb_fair_join
insert into tb_fair_join(join_id, reg_date, is_delete, fair_no, loginID)
values (#{join_id}, date_format(Now(), '%Y-%m-%d'), 2, #{fair_no}, #{loginId})
mapper.update: update tb_fair set fair_userNum = fair_userNum - 1, update_date = date_format(Now(), '%Y-%m-%d') where fair_no = #{fair_no}
mapper.insert:
select ifnull(max(mail_no), 0) + 1 from tb_mail
insert into tb_mail( mail_no, mail_title, mail_content, read_yn, reg_date, is_delete, loginID, mail_other ) values( #{mailno}, #{mail_title}, #{mail_content}, 2, date_format(Now(), '%Y-%m-%d'), 2, #{id}, #{mailother} )
